Topic.Title: "Nobody is Listening to your phone calls"

Message.Msg: Justice Department Fights Release of Secret Court Opinion Finding Unconstitutional Surveillance Government lawyers are trying to keep buried a classified court finding that a domestic spying program went too far. —By David Corn | Fri Jun. 7, 2013 12:22 PM PDT 202 In the midst of revelations that the government has conducted extensive top-secret surveillance operations to collect domestic phone records and internet communications, the Justice Department was due to file a court motion Friday in its effort to keep secret an 86-page court opinion that determined that the government had violated the spirit of federal surveillance laws and engaged in unconstitutional spying. This important case—all the more relevant in the wake of this week's disclosures—was triggered after Sen. Ron Wyden (D-Ore.), a member of the Senate intelligence committee, started crying foul in 2011 about US government snooping. As a member of the intelligence committee, he had learned about domestic surveillance activity affecting American citizens that he believed was improper. He and Sen. Mark Udall (D-Colo.), another intelligence committee member, raised only vague warnings about this data collection, because they could not reveal the details of the classified program that concerned them. But in July 2012, Wyden was able to get the Office of the Director of National Intelligence to declassify two statements that he wanted to issue publicly. They were:

Message.Title: The there is no apps cannot be used anymore
Message.Msg: Everything including Domino's, official Adobe Reader, Tmblr. There are a lot now. I mean a whole lot. It was almost better before. If you work, have things to do you can never go through them all now. I also notice that a few of the Nokia fan sites have paid apps on there now. Still hold a grudge because a long time ago when I posted a new product from Nokia and the guy from one of those sites identified himself and asked how it is possible to search for that. I told him and he posted it on his site with 2 minutes and since then he posts every listing on his site. The governments website for that search slowed to the pace of a crawl the first week he posted that. So apparently millions picked up the searches. The gov. must of updated their server since then. However, I have noticed repeated rumors that are way off and appear to cause earnings and product announcement disappointment's from one and actually all because they now copy each other. If someone is short I do not know. I know he is reading this. The EOS, Catwalk etc were rumored wrong for at least since Oct. 2012 or 2011 I have lost count. It does not matter if they eventually come out if you had it wrong for a half dozen product unveils etc. CNBC hosts read this site. Cramer reads this site. I spent time with professional analysts and traders that had the boards open all day. So these blogs should probably be more responsible and now there are paid apps so you can see a mobile version. The pro analyst and writers are putting stories together based on everything they can dig up. These posts show up in search engines you know. The blogs show higher than the actual Nokia Facebook page or it's own website. Just sayin'.

Message.Title: From a DHS insider: It's about to get ugly
Message.Msg: details “If anyone thinks that what’s going on right now with all of this surveillance of American citizens is to fight some sort of foreign enemy, they’re delusional. If people think that this ‘scandal’ can’t get any worse, it will, hour by hour, day by day. This has the ability to bring down our national leadership, the administration and other senior elected officials working in collusion with this administration, both Republican and Democrats. People within the NSA, the Department of Justice, and others, they know who they are, need to come forth with the documentation of ‘policy and practice’ in their possession, disclose what they know, fight what’s going on, and just do their job. I have never seen anything like this, ever. The present administration is going after leakers, media sources, anyone and everyone who is even suspected of ‘betrayal.’ That’s what they call it, ‘betrayal.’ Can you believe the size of their cahones? This administration considers anyone telling the truth about Benghazi, the IRS, hell, you name the issue, ‘betrayal,’” he said. “We know all this already,” I stated. He looked at me, giving me a look like I’ve never seen, and actually pushed his finger into my chest. “You don’t know jack,” he said, “this is bigger than you can imagine, bigger than anyone can imagine. This administration is collecting names of sources, whistle blowers and their families, names of media sources and everybody they talk to and have talked to, and they already have a huge list. If you’re not working for MSNBC or CNN, you’re probably on that list. If you are a website owner with a brisk readership and a conservative bent, you’re on that list. It’s a political dissident list, not an enemy threat list,” he stated. “What’s that exactly mean, being on that list, that is,” I asked, trying to make sense of it all. “It means that there will be censorship under the color of authority of anyone in the U.S. who is attempting to expose what’s going on in our name. It’s about controlling any damning information from reaching epidemic proportions. It’s damage control to the extreme. It’s about the upcoming censorship of the internet in the name of national security. The plans are already in place. These latest reports about ‘spying eyes’ have turned this administration and others connected to it into something very, very dangerous. They feel cornered and threatened, and I’m hearing about some plans they have to shut down the flow of information that is implicating them of wrongdoing. Time is short,” he stated. “How are they going to do this? How is it even possible” I asked. “First, they intend to use the Justice Department to silence journalists like in the Rosen case, but they won’t stop there. They will use a host of national security policies, laws, letters, whatever to take out the bigger threats,” he stated.

Topic.Title: From a DHS insider: It's about to get ugly

Message.Msg: I live within miles of NSA. I have to go there on business sometimes. I do not work there or know anything about the scandal. It is not just there to monitor computer records. They monitor every single form of communication there is in the public airwaves. The words people use signal further examination. Every form of communication cannot be monitored and the whole scandal is ridiculous. If you are doing some things wrong, they may look at whatever form of communication you made. Other than that to think they are reading your facebook messages is insane. There are not enough people working there to do that for every person in the world. They are really secret and it is a pain to go in or even to the offsite high tech blds. not on the campus or even Ft. Meade. I think people are going to give Obama a lot of grey hair, because the scandals are falling fast. This is a non event in real life. Google asked the NSA to find holes in their system maybe in 2007. I do not remember. They had so many malware attacks they had to go to the NSA. What happened is not public, but the rumor is they backed out after getting a taste of the US Gov. The NSA took an Android phone and ~worked it~ and made it safe for them to use themselves. It is not an Android like the public uses but they were able to make them safe for their own use. Now Google denies any knowledge. What is up with that statement. Will Microsoft surface in this scandal? Well investors should hope so. The NSA or US Gov. pays well really well for use of servers. Investors should hope so as they are a good client. If you think your data going over the internet is yours that is the mistake. They are public airwaves and the data in Facebook has to go through somewhere. Man some of the places down in Northern VA would surprise you. WorldCom then MCI, etc then everyone started moving in. There are a few in Annapolis MD too that I have seen some special parking for law enforcement only or something like that in data centers.

Message.Title: Welcome to the Large Black Hog Association!
Message.Msg: The Large Black Hog Association (LBHA) is the premier registry and support association for Large Black hogs in the United States. We are a non-profit association, managed by a group of dedicated volunteers, owners and breeders of this wonderful heritage hog.

Message.Title: Large Black (pig)
Message.Msg: The Large Black, occasionally called the Cook County Black, is a breed of domestic pig native to Illinois, particularly Cook County and Chicago. The Large Black is accurately named, as it is a large swine breed and is the only American pig that is entirely black. It is a hardy and bad tempered pig, with Large Black sows known for having litters of females. The breed's foraging ability make it particularly useful for extensive free range welfare, while a poor candidate for productive work.

Message.Title: Michelle Obama 'snubs wife of Chinese leader'
Message.Msg: Washington: The hope that this weekend's summit between Presidents Barack Obama and Xi Jinping might inject a new warmth into US-China relations suffered a setback this week when the White House announced that Michelle Obama would not be joining her husband. Her office cited domestic responsibilities for not attending - it is the last week of the school year for the Obamas' daughters Malia, 14, and Sasha, 11 - but the move leaves China's first lady, Peng Liyuan, to attend the summit without her American counterpart. China experts warned that Mrs Obama's decision to stay in Washington could have an unwelcome chilling effect on a summit that White House officials have billed as an "unprecedented" opportunity to heal divisions between the world's two biggest economies.

Topic.Title: From a DHS insider: It's about to get ugly

Message.Msg: No way. PRISM is a metaphor to take "noise" (or white light, white noise, white data) and segment it into distinct data sources. They don't need access to M$FT servers (which are probably buggy and full of viruses anymore). They just need the hash keys from Google / M$FT / Apple, etc. for ENCRYPTED communications. For your emails, they just grab the IP addresses and content. If this is correct, the Obama Administration has access to EVERY piece of data going over public networks. The Congress is probably being watched, the Supreme Court, the media, and we the people. Obama is the greatest threat to liberty since Hitler.

Message.Title: We have the biggest most bloated and wasteful government money can buy, it human nature
Message.Msg: and we have a totally screwed up banking system. I know people who can and regularly pay, and do pay $1000 a month for rent but cannot get a loan to buy a $60,000 house. The same people can get a $30,000 loan to buy a car or truck and finance it for up to 8 years now. Waste when endowed with plenty is nature for many humans, I did for years. If one has wads of dollars it is rare that you look for ways to save pennies, but it you really look you can not only save pennies but eventually wads of dollars and with virtually no pain. This is not a uniquely Obama era problem for sure but it ever grows under his "leader"ship.. For virtually every problem there are multiple agencies intended to address the problem. With a real leader we could balance the budget in three years and barely feel it. These idiotic whines about sequester suffering because some budget is cut less than 1% are genuinely sad for us as a people to be accepting them as true.

Message.Title: you might live in a country founded by geniuses but run by idiots. part 1
Message.Msg: If you can get arrested for hunting or fishing without a license, but not for being in the country illegally ... If you have to get your parent's permission to go on a field trip or take an aspirin in school, but not to get an abortion ... If you have to show identification to board an airplane, cash a check, buy liquor or check out a library book, but not to vote who runs the government ... If the government wants to ban stable, law-abiding citizens from owning gun magazines with more than ten rounds, but gives 20 F-16 fighter jets to the crazy new leaders in Egypt If, in the largest city, you can buy two 16-ounce sodas, but not a 24-ounce soda because 24-ounces of a sugary drink might make you fat ..

Message.Title: you might live in a country founded by geniuses but run by idiots. part 2
Message.Msg: If your government believes that the best way to eradicate trillions of dollars of debt is to spend trillions more ... If a seven year old boy can be thrown out of school for saying his teacher's "cute," but hosting a sexual exploration or diversity class in grade school is perfectly acceptable If hard work and success are met with higher taxes and more government intrusion, while not working is rewarded with EBT cards, WIC checks, Medicaid, subsidized housing and free cell phones ... If the government's plan for getting people back to work is to incentivize NOT working with 99 weeks of unemployment checks and little requirement to prove they applied but can't find work ... If being stripped of the ability to defend yourself makes you more "safe" according to the government ...

Topic.Title: you might live in a country founded by geniuses but run by idiots. part 1

Message.Msg: I honestly Laughed out loud at you. You need to register to be eligible to vote, but you need not prove you are the person who registered. Not surprisingly you went the wrong way on the rest, it's not that there should not be hunting seasons and licenses and penalties for not obtaining a license it's that those standard should not be greater than being in the country illegally. It's not that one should not need I.D. to get on a plane, although I flew plenty of times and places before it was required, it's that that standard should not be greater than to elect the people who make the laws. "You want to be able to have more than 10 round magazines, and/or no background checks, even though children have been slaughtered with such" I don't want idiotic new regulations that will impose restrictions needlessly while doing no good, which is what 10 round limit bans will do, there are millions in existence.

Message.Title: This New Rival Is Coming for Apple and Google
Message.Msg: Google it. The new rival is Tizen, basically the Linux kernel plus the WebKit runtime. Tizen is supported by Intel plus Samsung. This undoubtedly presages the nature of the software wars of the future. They will not be Apple versus Microsoft, or Microsoft versus Google, etc. They will be struggles between different versions of Linux.

There is a major difference in security with Windows phone apps. I know that sounds unbelievable but it is true. You have to actually write the apps to know the difference but their is a major difference.
